document_data.caption: Sapphiraktar looming over his fellow Twisted Runes at a meeting
document_data.name: Sapphiraktar
document_data.mainbody: '''Sapphiraktar''' was an ancient male [[blue dragon|blue]] [[dracolich]] and a member of the [[Twisted Rune]].
document_data.Description: Out of vanity, the dracolich maintained his [[dragon]] appearance through magic.
document_data.Personality: Preparing to kill [[Jymahna]] for spying, Sapphiraktar taught dragon magic to [[Rhangaun]].
document_data.Activities: Sapphiraktar made his cavern home in the  ruined city of [[Teshyll]] west of [[Alatorin]] in [[Calimshan]].
document_data.History: Around [[1072 DR]], Sapphiraktar became a dracolich.
